message: Fair split, let's call it a day!
You're being greedy, I'm being generous. Your turn to decide!
You're being too generous, I'll take a bit more
You're not being fair, I'll take more
I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
You're getting desperate, I'll take the rest
I'll take a smaller share, but I'm not going down without a fight!
